name: Christmas special 298 Levels.
description:
So you want something soothing and relaxing to play while traveling or spending free time at home? Well here's a special one for the Holidays.

Christmas Loot is a Candy Crush style game with procedural difficulty. Soothing music, and calming HD graphics, won't end any time soon as you got 298 unique levels to win.

No in-game ads or micro transactions.

*This app will be available on PlayStore soon with in-game ads.
